availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth Melney Gilkey in Union, Kentucky on November 29, 1836. Father of William Gilkey. Resident in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860. Mentioned in receipt dated May 20, 1864 confirming boarding services.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 815. Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562195, p. 166. KYR-0002-222-0131.
